column6: "BOGAN" pts. 1 & 2 (of 5) A mysterious telepath enters into the lives of the X-Men; an unknown assailant unexpectedly captures Bishop; Sage discovers a startling secret; plus the return of one of their most dangerous foes! 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99 (each)
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
